lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome, everyone, to today's special edition of Critical Role, where a number of us are going to be playing a fantastic game in the realm of Mordor, thanks to our fantastic sponsor for this event, WB Games! We're putting this together in celebration of the release of their upcoming game, Shadow of War, for Xbox and Playstation, which all of us have worked on, actually, for an extended period of time. Let's see. Well, first off, Travis, who'd you play in the game?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I played Commanding Orc #1, and I scream like this and I will be chasing you as you try and make your way through the lands, and I escalate my ambitions through the war ranks! I just made that up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So kill him immediately. Laura, who'd you play in the game?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't play an orc.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Who do you play?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I play Eltariel, also known as the Blade of Galadriel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's super bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a super cool and I have, like, daggers, and I can kick a lot of butt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a great little view of the character, there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just like a normal elf.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's exactly how I recorded it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. Sam, what'd you do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I played a character named Orc 4, who, among other things, hates humans. Enjoys grog. And is dumb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How does he feel about elves?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I think he hates them? I think he hates most things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a very affable--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he just hates. He's a hater. Really, they should spend more of the game talking about his wants and needs, and his ambitions and likes in life, but no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does he hate the player, or does he hate the game?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He hates both. Just hates a lot of stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Darin De Paul?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Hi, internet friends!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hi! What'd you play in the game?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I am a massive olog, but he became-- one of them became kind of notorious. Az-Laar the Demolisher. There were, like, "RIP Az-Laar." There were tribute videos to Az-Laar. People played sad music when Az-Laar died. It was amazing. (deep gruff voice) A big dumb thing, but he died from flames! (normal voice) And people were very upset, so they were playing tinkling music and going, "Rest in Peace, Az-Laar! We hardly knew you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was in the previous--?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I wasn't here yet. I had not come to California yet. I was still in New York going, I really hope I get to do stuff like that! It's really fun!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You hear Darin and you're like, he was definitely an orc forever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: It's only been, it's a little over four years that I have been among the people that I admire most. It makes my heart so happy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Feels like too long.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Thank you! And we haven't even started the episode.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Without further ado, guys, let's go ahead and dive into the world of Mordor, shall we? Actually, before we begin, because we haven't actually established here, do you guys want to talk about who you're playing in this game?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should I start?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, sure!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very creepy! Yeah. I'm a little goblin that's got a crossbow and a shortsword, and I'm here to run amok and advance, you know, my efforts against the horrible humans and elves of the land of Mordor.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: This could be my favorite day ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm already so invested in everything. Thank you, Travis. Laura?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm olog-hai, so I'm kind of big. But you know, I don't necessarily want to be a fighter, I'm just really good at it, you know? Because I'm unbreakable and all. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Laura. Darin?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: There's two things you have to know about me. My name is Mozuu the Chosen, and that's it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was two things!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Sam, who are you playing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (raspy voice) Hello.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: You all right, mate?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (rasping) Hello.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: We got that part.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My name is Ur-Eden Goodthink, and I'm the olog you want to see if you're hurt. Because me is a sawbones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're an olog, too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm an olog, so I'm rather big. But I'm also a sawbones, which means if you have a toothache or something, you come to me, I pull the tooth right out. Probably half of your jaw, too. If you got a broken bone, I pull the arm off. If you got a rash, I pull your skin off. So really, I take care of all your medical needs. Somebody came to me with-- they were having some stress dreams. I ripped their head off. Solved the problem right away!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great outpatient.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Usually most things can be solved without insurance. But yeah, I'm here to help anyone who gets injured, and also to kill some man-filth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the clanking of glasses and partially cracked mugs nearby. The cheers and rowdy screams and yells of various half-drunken uruk in your vicinity, (shouting). You see two guys in the back far corner that are in the middle of a fist-fight with a small crowd gathering, but it's too measly for your attention. You all sit here, staring into your cups, contemplating your existence.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched whining)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the matter, Skak?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just bored, that's all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to go with me to kill something? Would that break your boredom?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that an option? We could do that, now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, those two fellows having the fist fight, we could go kill one of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's Rarr versus Oog, over there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Naw, I think it's Oog, and it's actually Oop-tha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could be right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you get them easily confused.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They look a lot alike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, they do. All the uruks do.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Is that what you really want? You just want to fight and bleed for nothing, or do we want gold? Ain't that what we're after?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like gold!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Of course you like gold. We all like gold! And I say we find it. While they're fighting and they're dying for nothing, we make our way up and we rule this world, eh?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I thought Barfta ruled this world.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: There's two things you have to know about Barfta. One, he

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He keeps doing this, with the two things.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing. You're always-- I'm a fan of gold as well.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Well said, my friend. You see this gold helmet that I stole?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that gold?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Of course it's gold! Don't mind the man-filth head on the pike on the helmet, ha! That's ornamentation. But you know what you aren't? You aren't the head of man-filth on my helmet. You're alive. And while we're alive, we make a difference. Eh?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's that exact moment that a heavy nudge slaps into the back of Mozuu. You watch a familiar, lanky, nasty-looking uruk with large, broken teeth and a wiry physicality slamming into him, his large cup of thick, brackish grog spilling over and across your shoulder as he spins around to stare down at you, Mozuu. You recognize this as Hoshgrish Bootlick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hoshgrish?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hoshgrish Bootlick. He turns around. "What you doing, bumping my drink, lob?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Hoshgrish. He's such a bully.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Come here. Come closer, Hoshgrish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I'm doing just fine right here! Will you go ahead and refill my drink!" And he puts his cup right on the table in front of you.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Skak! Refill his drink while I have a little word with Hoshgrish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a problem. Could I have, could you hand me--? It's really high up there, right.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: You're ruining the moment, Skak!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay! I've got it!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: What's your problem, mate? We're just sitting here having a little discussion. You wander up drunkenly, you bump into me! At least you didn't get wine on the helmet. And now you're looking for trouble? Is that what you're looking for, Hoshgrish Bootlick?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he wipes the bit of spittle from the bottom of his pointed, jagged chin, he looks down at you with a sly grin, his overbite curling back as it exposes with the smile. "Heh heh! You "obviously haven't seen the last one who bumped into me when I was drinking! So you want to start "a problem? Please, be my guest." He takes a few steps back and you watch as his hands go down to pull two jagged, black blades from the side. He spins and tosses them in the air and catches them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey. You mess with Mozuu, you mess with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've had my drink disrespected and I'll take a head for that!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Oh! Oh, well, he was, his drink was disrespected, that's all it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Skak, you got that drink for him yet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was I supposed to do that?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, hold on one more second.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: We'll refill your drink, friend, but know, they call me Mozuu the Chosen because Sauron spoke to me. You know what he said? "The strong take what they want."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Dark Lord spoke to you?"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Aye, he did. That's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What a load of serak!" He puts his blades back in, like now disinterested, completely shut off from the conversation. "Give me my drink."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, here you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. 'Mozuu the Chosen.'" Turns around and starts walking away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true? Did Sauron really talk to you?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Of course it's true. Everything I say is true, except the things that ain't, but that is true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because sometimes I hear voices, but then I turn around and it's just an orc talking to me that I didn't see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sometimes I'm talking to you, sometimes but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but I didn't see you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Sometimes. Because your helmet blocks the view, you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's the problem with these things.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: This was in my head, I heard it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's he sound like?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Well, scary. Large. And he sounds like Sauron. He sounds like a Dark Lord. He sounds like someone who should be obeyed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what he sounds like to me?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A medical condition. I should probably get my axe, chop up your head, and see what's in there making that noise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe just the top of it.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Wait. There's two things you should do with that axe. One, put it away. And that's it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's so good at math.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this conversation's taking place, you hear this massive, echoing explosion right over your shoulders as you see a flash of light and heat brighten the courtyard around you. Everyone in the vicinity looks up past. You can see one of the three large towers that sits in the courtyard of this fortress. The tower of Warchief Barfta is currently in flames, his chamber being burned as the thatch and mud that comprises its exterior are beginning to burn. You can see now everyone's mobilizing around you, grabbing weapons as a series of arrows come arcing in from over one of the walls. Three or four nearby uruk go (dying sounds) and fall to the ground, dead immediately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take a helmet off one and put it in my bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take out a crossbow, do I see any intruders?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't that where Barfta lives up there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it's on fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12, okay! You glance around rapidly and you see people running back and forth and you can see guards along the wall, but the guards are firing inward. You see three or four uruk up on the edge of the perimeter wall that are currently loading up their crossbows or shortbows and are ready to fire another volley into the crowd currently drinking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't understand! Those are uruk! Why are they firing at us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because they need to die!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go get them!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go! I pick up my quarterstaff and start stomping towards the tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ditto with my maul.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You follow as well?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I follow, behind them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's where good leaders go.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as Mozuu's picking up the rear you can see other goblins and uruk rushing past. You see another volley get loosed towards it. I need all of you to make dexterity saving throws, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you get?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I also got a one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Off to a great start!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Ten!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten, all right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Both Mozuu and Arburuk manage to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can call me Arby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both suffer six points of piercing damage as a series of bolts or arrows stick into your chest and shoulders. You flex and tear them off as you rush forward towards the side of the tower before you now, the smoke billowing off the top of the inferno.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I step in front of Skak here to try to block him from any more arrows coming. I'm a defender, you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could have used my Deflect Missiles! I'll do that next time!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You need to be on your game! Come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! So as you guys are rushing forward now, the crowd swarming up behind you, you glance over to the right and you can see pouring out of the back side of this tower, three very brutish-looking uruk with bulging muscles. They have dark helmets on and this faint glow in their eyes as they charge in and start cleaving into nearby allies of yours that were drinking not a moment ago.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Am I far enough away to pick one off with my crossbow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it! Make an attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay! Crossbow, 1d8.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know what those are! This is cool, Matt!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's good! That is 11.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, no! 16.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not close at all!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, it's way off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll consider that in character.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! d8. That's a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, 1d8 plus four. So nope, that's wrong. That's a six. Six damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is currently in a scuffle with somebody, so I'll let you get sneak attack damage if you want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, you're a roguey rogue!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 3d6, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy smokes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He gets 3d6?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five, six, ten. 11 total. Sneak attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so on top of the six, 17. So you watch as this one orc grunt, rushing forward, takes its battleaxe and jams it right into the clavicle of one of the nearby Uruk. Its weapon falls out of its hand. As it looks up, towards you, with a flash in its eyes, (gurgle), the bolt goes straight into its throat. (gurgle) It begins to bleed out its black dark ichor, before it falls to the ground, not moving.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got one!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice going, Skak! I run forward and try to do the same thing to another one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I will actually ask you three, since he got the jump on him, two other existing ones are now charging towards you, to roll initiative real fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. 18.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: What do I add to my roll? 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So we have Ur-Eden, we have Arby.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can call me Eden.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: You can call me Mozuu the Chosen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's only two things you need to call me.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Mozuu the Chosen, and that's it. Will this be a theme? Yes it will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (guttural shout)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll pick up my quarterstaff with two hands, and I will hit one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) The one on the left. Hiyah! Ooh, not good. 11!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. Nope! You swing, and it ducks low, and it's going to come up with an upward strike. Do you have another attack?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a second attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, attack again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, this one is better! 26!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. 1d8 plus four. I don't know how to do this. Okay, that's eight points of damage. But! Let's do other things, too. I'm going to use my Stunning Strike, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you spend a ki point to stun him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to use a ki point. Yes. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Describe the Stunning Strike for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. The Stunning Strike. So when I hit him, I, knowing my medical knowledge that I have so well, I aim for the one place that I know hurts the most: the wang.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Would you like to act it out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On you.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Oh no, wait! I'm wearing a suit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I jab him right between the legs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the uruk term for that, by the way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, right in the gronk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right in the gronk. Sharply hit. Nice and low. Gronk hit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It barely manages to maintain grip on the battleaxe, but right now is doubled over, knees knocked inward, in a bad place. Currently not able to sustain any sort of combat motive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take that, you glob!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groans) There's no words. That ends your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I believe so. Oh, wait, a bonus. I don't know how this guy works.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he stay stunned for a turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get a free bonus action strike if you want to, with your fist.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action strike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, great. I will. If I hit a stunned person, does he become unstunned? No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, that's the Flurry of Blows with your Ki point, if you wanted to spend another one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no, I'm good. I'm done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But if you hit a guy that's stunned, does he become unstunned?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. But attacks against him have advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So next up is Arby. Arby, what are you going to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to run up and hit the guy that he hit between the legs with my maul.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as he's like (groans).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hit him like a batter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The eyes glance up to meet yours, just as you go for the giant golf swing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a 15 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage on this strike, don't forget.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because he's stunned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a 19 to hit. No, that's wrong, that was a 17 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) That's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it still hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Okay, let's see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, sorry, with the staff, you still can do a bonus action strike if you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. That's crazy! I already took two hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two hits, and bonus action you can get a third. Or spend a Ki point and get a fourth as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I jab at the guy next to me? All right, sorry, Laura, I'm interfering.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 12 on the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guy who's stunned, you knock him a good 15 feet in the air with an arc. (shout) His crumpled body lands on the large wooden spikes of the wall that you see some of the archers are on above and is stuck on there, impaled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was artistic. Is there another guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you the scar artist?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's me! I'm the Scar-Artist!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have something else you have to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was just jabbing the other guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll for that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Another eight points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And then you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And there's another guy I can hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same guy that he's attacking, so there's two more that weren't destroyed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. That might not. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, from hitting the first guy, it's already telegraphed your next swing against the other. He sidesteps it, passes by.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's because I wasn't looking at him. I was looking at the beauty on the spike over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed. He's going to rush up to you with his battleaxe and make a strike towards you, who destroyed his friend. That's going to be an 18.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is my armor class.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it manages to hit you. You suffer 11 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! I'm going to use my reaction to reduce the damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're using your Troll's Endurance?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but can I only do that once?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once per short rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You better pick the time you want to use it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm not going to do that just yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you take 11 points of slashing damage as the battleaxe comes down, slamming between two plates of armor and embedding itself somewhere in your torso. Mozuu, your turn.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: There's one or two left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one left, who's been partially wounded.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That will stop him in his tracks, will it?

lines.name: MATT, DARIN
lines.text: It may.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Such a thinker, this one.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Because I shouted to him in a very powerful way. I speak for Sauron.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the spell DC?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: The spell DC: 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's going to happen is you get to subtract 1d4 from any of his rolls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am going to use Troll's Endurance because if it's once per short rest, then it's okay, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! I'm going to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll your d12.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! Eight plus two, so I only take one point of damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One point of slashing damage. You shrug it off. It goes through the plates of the armor, hits the skin and gets a minute in there, and you flex your abs. They're so strong!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're so strong!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice, Arby!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks! That's why I'm Unbreakable; this is why!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that end your turn?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, another volley of crossbow bolts and arrows comes flying over. You can see maybe a dozen flying from the wall. Other Uruk are climbing to try and head these guys off in the distance. I need you all to make another dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys manage to dodge out of the way. However, both of you take five points of piercing damage as a bolt or arrow hits each of you in the shoulder or back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mine hit the back; yours hit the shoulder.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: There's two things you have to know about where that arrow hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a smaller explosion, muffled. More smoke's billowing out the side. It's a rather large chamber that he lives in and it looks like about half of it is engulfed in flames, the side nearest to the entrance. You guys rush up the stairs to head up the side of the tower? Or do you find another way around?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any other ways around? Are there ladders?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Did we defeat the one that we held?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's still standing there. What are you going to do; are you going to fight that guy or keep moving?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's fuck that guy up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then Eden, you're up first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. We're going to beat this guy? I'm ignoring this guy; I'm going to charge into the stairwell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go up the tower! Go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Attack of opportunity against you. That is a 15. What's your armor class?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he have to roll a negative four?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has to minus d4 from him. So go ahead and roll a d4.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That is a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 12.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He does not hit me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The axe swings wide and you start darting up the steps. Up next would be Arby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to hit him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about me? I thought I was at the top of the round, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, because I went first with the sneak attack.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: It was your height, we overlooked you because you're the smallest of the group apparently. You're a wee thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I run up and draw my shortsword, two hands, and try and stick it in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an attack. With advantage, because he is currently--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll damage on that with sneak attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shortsword, 1d6.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm standing next to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sneak attack, five, six, ten--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sneak attack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Because somebody's within melee. 12 points of damage to his gut!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, as he's currently standing there swinging wide, missing Eden as he rushes past, he begins to give chase. At that point his body stiffens up as the blade sinks right into the back of the spine. You drag it down through the shoulder blades, and as it brings his arms forward it kind of opens the wound. He crumples to the ground, not moving.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A beautiful scar to add to my collection.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: How many does this make?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It makes 30.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, you shugs, come with me up the stairs!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Wait a minute, who's the leader of this group?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Barfta.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Of this group, of us four!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I was thinking I could lead?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As a collective? Do we vote? Is it democracy?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: This is a democracy in which I lead. Let's go up the stairs, as he said.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the rest of you catch up. You're faster than the rest, so you dart up towards the top of the stairs. Partway up the stairway, as you rush around the corner, you see an even more muscular orc standing there right before you. No helmet on, fury and this faint gray glow to the eyes. Swinging wide with a giant, two-handed hammer, goes swinging towards you. And gets two attacks, but the first one, a natural two, misses the first one. And a natural one for the second one. Swings wide once, and then swings a second time and you put your foot out and trip him, and as you do he stumbles forward and the hammer actually slams into the side of the tower. It wedges itself into the stonework as it's cracked and broken inward. And is currently trying to pull its weapon out of the stonework.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that looks like a problem. I will solve it! I will attack him with my quarterstaff. Ten plus seven, ooh, 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! So that hit goes for, ooh, 12 points, and you said he looked stronger than the rest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will use my Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you get three more attacks on him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would like to flurry! 19 plus seven!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, roll damage on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's another nine points of damage. 20, natural 20!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Well flurried, friend!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll your dice, double it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So two?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's two plus four. So that's six. And then one more. Six plus seven is only a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 just barely hits, doesn't have a lot of armor on him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight plus four, another 12 points of damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So how do you want to do this? You finish this guy off. With these four strikes, as he's currently trying to wrestle his weapon from the side of the tower, how do you finish him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like Zorro.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But my name is Eden? So I'm going to try and write an E. (grunts)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With an exposed muscular torso, it takes a lot of pressure to try and cut someone with a quarterstaff. However, you thankfully as an olog-hai are a very strong creature by nature, and in a horrible display, you break the skin and force an E across his body with your quarterstaff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I make a lowercase E?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure! With that, he looks down at the E and you just push him off the edge of the stairs and he tumbles. You hear this lower-pitched Wilhelm scream.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (roaring)

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Ur-Eden, keep him alive! We need to question him!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He committed suicide.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: As they all do when they see your might.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said he was so scared of you, Mozuu!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah, there's two things people do when they're scared of me. Commit suicide, and that's it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point you guys have now caught up to the back of Ur-Eden, and you guys climb up the rest of the stairs. You can now look over the side of the walls, and you can see a number of the uruk within this fortress have now overtaken a lot of the marauding, arriving traitors that had begun to attack. And it seems like most of the uprising's being quelled, however no one has gotten to the tower as quick as you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do the uprisers, the rebels, look different? Do they have anything different about them in their eyes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door's partially broken inward and flames have completely wreathed the entrance to this chamber. It's really hot and you immediately recoil at the blaze before you. How do you wish to proceed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Barfta in there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's where he slumbers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it's on fire?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should probably go in.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: If we rescue him, we're heroes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a (muffled yelling) from behind the wall on the inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Barfta, is that you?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes, tell us if it's you. If it's you say, "This is Barfta, I'm on fire!" If you're not on fire, say-- You know, just say whatever you like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a brief pause before you hear again (muffled yelling).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if that was Barfta.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Therefore, I do not know if we should enter--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should break the door down to see who it is?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Break it down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I try to break it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make an attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17 plus eight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll damage! With your giant maul, you slam down with this gargantuan hammer into the burning wood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get to reroll ones! Ten plus five, 15!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking inside, you can see flames have taken the entire western side of the chamber. You can see a lot of the silks that he keeps-- For the point here, as the leader of this portion of the marauder tribe, Barfta likes nice things. Even glancing inside you've gotten little glimpses of the inside of his chamber here and there, and you can see gold spoils adorning taken cabinets and boxes and crates left around. There's just a large pile of somewhat loosely comfortable materials that you scoff at the idea of such comfort, but silently in the back of your head, you're like, I bet that's nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see where Barfta is in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's just like gone feral in his face at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he look like he's in trouble? Does he look hurt?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Injured? On fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm very perceptive. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glances over, looks in your direction, "What're you doing? Get in and help!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I try to break through the rest of the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so make an athletics check. Since you've already ruined most of its structure, this is more of a just pushing the rest of it out of the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no. Oh, I have really good athletics! 12.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's nice, isn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, oh my god! I'm so strong!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Warchief, "You there, make yourself useful and get my information!" He throws the wounded assassin at your feet who tumbles. He starts coughing and trying to get up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I step on him, but not to kill him, to hold him in place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (coughing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you answer some questions for us, please?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why are you being so polite?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no. I scream in his face. Somebody ask him questions.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Hello friend, my name is Mozuu the Chosen. I've heard the voice of Sauron. He told me the strong take what they want. You see all this around here? That could be part of yours if you're strong enough. You tell us why, why you'd do this, and riches await you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that the truth?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Shush. Oh, I'm bad at dice. Miss. 15 plus-- Where is my thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Persuasion, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. He calms down for a minute and smiles at you. You can see that same weird gray flash in his eyes. "You'll get nothing from me. Death comes for you all."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Death comes for us all, friend, it just depends on when. It doesn't have to come for you today. Riches can be yours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look, I was sent by Ur-Gram the Face-Eater."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ur-Grandma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ur-Gram the Face-Eater. "See, he survived his duel in the wastes east of here under a new "lord. They have many under their banner. We was sent to take this fort, we was, and succeed we "would have, and we will again soon. Nargroth is next. Enjoy your heads while you still got them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start looking around the room and forget that I'm actually standing on him and I put my full weight down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gargled screaming)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, does that hurt?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: We thank you for your information. Arby, eat his face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't actually like the taste of--

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Okay, that was a good moment and I was like threatening him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll just finish stepping on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heavy stomp. Just this watermelon splatter of Uruk head against the stonework. The flames still burning around. The Warchief seems less frustrated.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Your problem was solved, Warchief. We interrogated.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just carving little scars into the dead body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Warchief has now sat down on the ground, back slumped against the pile of rags and cloth that he sleeps on and pulls a bottle of spoiled wine and uncorks it. Begins to wash the open wounds on the arm, takes a swig.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, oh yes, do you need medical attention, my lord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Does it look like I need medical attention?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then fix me!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I grab my healer's kit and I will use my really dirty bandages to wrap him up. I don't really have anything to fasten it with so I hock a loogie on one and then fasten it to the other piece and hope that holds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect, okay, roll your healing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yes, 1d6 plus nine. 12 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ur-Gram leaves and wants to take my fort, does he? Wants to wallow in my shadow, does he? That "sniveling orog's going to taste a

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Do you have a hundred blades?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've got more than a hundred blades!"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: How many exactly

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your job now is to count the blades."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: We have two blades.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are so good at-- oh, counting.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yeah, I am very good at counting. That's why they call me Mozuu the Chosen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mozuu?"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: The Chosen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And who chose you?"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Sauron.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "Stupid. What's your names, then? Who's your commander?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We follow Barfta-- oh wait, that's you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's right. You follow

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shouting) "What's your name?"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Mozuu the Chosen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My name's Ur-Eden. Ur-Eden Goodthink. You can call me Eden.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm Arb-Uruk, the Unbreakable. But you can call me Arby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, powerful Barfta! I am lowly Skak the Scar-Artist, to serve you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. You seem to be an able-bodied lot. You want to show your Warchief what

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Is this before or after I count the blades?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "After."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah? Then go!" (gulps)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where are we going again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm getting there! Head east. Find where Ur-Gram is hiding, tell me where and I'll reward "you. Bring me back his head, I'll shoot you all straight to captains, with your own roots beneath you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Captains!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now hurry! Before the tracks go cold! Go!"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Again, you asked me to count blades, and yet now--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Count them quickly! I don't care!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a figure of speech, Mozuu.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I'll say there's more than a hundred. We're going. We will bring you glory and we will bring you his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Hundred swords. Heh."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I run across the room to the hole that was blown in the other side of the room, check for clues or how they did it, or if there's any trace of who came in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check in the vicinity, and then a perception check looking through the hole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While he's doing that, can I walk over to Eden and say, I got burned a little in the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Do you need some healing, then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't take my skin off, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 25 on the investigation, and an eight on the perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Looking through the hole that is blasted into the side of this wall, there is a number of crumpled uruk, you see there are two assassins on the ground, both with ruined forms, seemingly the explosion that they brought here also blew them apart. The style you can appreciate. But you do see they have-- somehow through this explosion, three small encased leather-bound orbs that survived the detonation. You take and sniff it, it's a very familiar smell of powder.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Explodey powder? Can I pocket those three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do indeed. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was your perception check?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An eight. You glance out past the hole, to the dark hills in the distance. Nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's real blurry. Of you all, who has really good like, you know, eyeballs?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if they're good or not, but I've got some eyeballs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you see anything out here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bring out my patch of eyeballs. Which kind did you need, because I got little eyeballs and bigger eyeballs?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long have you been holding those?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some of those aren't eyeballs, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The eagles! The eagles are coming! (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was amazing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you Gandalf? Oh shit.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: It's the magic of Mordor!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we should follow you now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm the chosen one! I'm the chosen!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That was Sauron made flesh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so...no?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Put those away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ow, but that made my hands hurt worse, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I could heal you right now, or we could use hit dice and take a short rest and that way I would save my ability to heal you later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Oh yeah, and then I get my troll's endurance back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So! Maggots!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you're still here!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Sorry, sorry!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we're going to do this for you by the Dark Lord's name, I feel that our group of four should have some sort of group name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh! Like a callsign!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, a callsign or something. Is that something you could hook us up with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean..."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have like fancy pins or something we could wear?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or the Orc Four! The Orc Four! The Forcs!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: The Forcs! The Forcs!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You! Are the Barfta Forcs!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we get little patches that say "Get Forc-ed"?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you should, you should just carve it in because you're a Scar-Artist!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, hold on, just one minute!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: While you do that, I'm going to go count some blades from this window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a perception check.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Okay. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16; glancing about over the next five or ten minutes or so, you just count blades in the courtyard, and those that are pulling the bodies of the gathered mutineers and executing them in the middle of the courtyard; you count probably a good solid 73-74 blades by your estimation in immediate visual range. You throw in some, you know, estimations of non-visual range based blades, the size of the fortress, probably something around 125 blades currently available in just this small encampment outside the main fortress.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: We find this guy you want, this guy dies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I like you."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Well thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But get out."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Oh! Yeah, right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your shoulder is finished, where do you want yours?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My shoulder looks really good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Across my back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're glancing out, you look past the eastern mountainscape; you can see what are the Mithram Spur mountains to the east of this encampment. The shadows of night have been claiming this vicinity as the sun's faded. You see a handful of fleeing goblins, just vanishing into the mountains heading eastward and disappearing into the shadows at the base.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Fleeing? Well, I couldn't probably tell, the goblins--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're running away.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: In the direction we're headed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's take on after them.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yeah. Because, well, what goblins are afraid of, no offense to you, we are not afraid of. We're better than goblins, no offense to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Again, no.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yeah. Are we going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No wait, you need your tattoo, yours is done, it's on the lower back. Where would you like your Forcs tattoo?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want one on your arm like I got?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: See this head on my helmet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Put it up there. Because this will cause true terror in any goblin, again, no offense to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. We'll get it later, we should probably get after them.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Take this helmet and do it as we run! You are a true artiste.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was that a short rest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you take a short rest outside of the chambers of Warchief Barfta who has been trying to get you to leave for the past 20-- the chamber is just in flames around him, he's just sitting there drinking like "Leave! Me!"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: We have, technically, we are outside the room, technically we have left. He agrees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Smartass."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I get ki points back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Holy moly, I'm so powerful! Wow!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Must we roll to get hit points back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hit dice. It will say right there.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Oh! Well, that's nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's shrak mean again? Is that a dick?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Shrak is feces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Excrement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. A gronk is a dick?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A gronk is a dick. How will we chase after these bad guys? Are we going to ride on something, or should we just walk? Do we need a cart?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we have any mounts available?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Do we see any carangors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have, in this encampment, three carangors, that are caged, feral. They haven't been broken yet. But they are currently caged in the corner, you could see a few beastmasters that roam about. As you walk up to approach and take a look, you see one of them has a pike with this long, slivering piece of meat that has a little bit of skin on it still, and you think may have belonged to one of the uruks that just got killed in the fray and just throws into the cage. Immediately, this extremely large, hyena dog-like hybrid beast starts tearing it apart, getting gore everywhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: See, I'm afraid that would be us, if we tried to ride them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you scared of a carangor?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very much so. Yeah, I mean, look at them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've killed so many carangor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I haven't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I haven't either.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could ride on my back. I could give you a piggyback ride.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not that I need it, but I will accept.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I think we're too big to ride this scatagorse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The scatagorus?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yeah, close enough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. Are we too big?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, it's a big beast. You can certainly try.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is anyone good with animals?

lines.name: TRAVIS, DARIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this conversation, you see one of the beastmasters is by the cage, looking at you with his head turned to the side, curious as to what you're talking about. And immediately, this claw grabs him and pulls him against the cage, (screaming) as one of the jaws grabs and tears his shoulder off from the back. He goes, (grunting). The other uruks start hitting it with pikes from the side of the cage, to calm it down, but it's already torn the guy apart. You're like, this is bad.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: We're walking, we are walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as you guys exit the outside of the fortress on the outskirts of Nargroth, you begin to make your way eastward towards the mountains, in the direction where you saw these fleeing goblins. Who's helming this journey? Who wants to be tracking eastward?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he has the head on his helmet, so he can probably see farther than the rest of us.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes, but the eyes are missing. If you gave me a couple of your eyes, we could stick them in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's a couple. They don't match, but that's all right.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: It's just eyes. So I'll take out a couple of the eyes, I take off my helmet, and I put them in. And now, I am known as Mozuu the Chosen, the tracker with the helmet that has the head with the eyes in it currently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Upgrade. I'm going to take Skak and I'm going to sit him on my shoulder.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (frantic noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he's slowly carving-- well no, if you have the helmet on to track, he can't carve into it as you're moving. So a choice has to be made.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Well, the eyes will be able to see as you're carving. You tell me what they see, we go that way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm to interpret the eyes?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Exactly. That what makes us a team! That's what makes us the Forcs, apparently.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: The Forcs!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I want you to make a dexterity check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) That was good. Oh, that's a million. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even though it's a bumpy ride on the back of an olog, it's a beautiful display on this helmet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's got mosaic work, filigree! It's really nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're really proud of it, and also roll a perception check, because you're now the person interpreting the eyes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh good. Minus two. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. Okay. So as you glance about, and you take a little while, heading forward, you begin to find the easiest path up the mountainside. As opposed to having to climb cliff over cliff, you guys eventually hit the base of the Mithram Spur Mountains, and begin to slowly pull your way up the occasional cliffside, but for the most part, you've managed to maintain a fairly easy to climb switchback path that has been walked through this mountain range a number of times. Make a survival check for me, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You hear those people screaming in the background?

lines.name: SAM, DARIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I literally rolled a zero. Two minus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as you guys begin to curl up and down the edge of this mountain range, you can see the large fortress of Nargroth in the distance, and the outskirts of the one small watch fortress on the outside of it, the three of which dot its exterior. The one furthest to the east that you just came from begins to disappear over the high mountain spires and now, in the dark skies, the black of night, just the faint glow of orange-red in the distance as Mount Doom occasionally flares up into the clouds ahead. It is very dark. Thankfully, I believe most of you have some form of darkvision.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 60 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And torches.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Great, so you guys are able to make your way through, following the wonderful direction of Skak on top.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The eyes speak often. They lead us forth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've noticed that one of those eyes is a wolf's eye, and the other is an acorn. Is that going to...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Shouldn't make any difference. Both the land and the beast speak to me through the eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leading you with absolute confidence up the side of this mountain path.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: And you can't spell seed without

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if that's right.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: S-E-E is "see." S-E-E-E-D-D-D-D-D is "seed." Therefore, you could, if you wanted to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Extrapolate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your foot hits it. The mountain seems to give way for a moment into a little bit of a plateau, and there looks to be packed ash and dirt that fills this small vicinity. And while you were conversing and listening and following the direction of Skak, your foot hits this soft mound.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, something's down here. It's softer. I start stomping on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I would like all of you to make an intelligence check, please.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18. This is new for me, guys! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as all of you begin to follow suit with Arby and stomping on the soft dirt, you're like, wait, we've raided some of these before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait a second. Yeah, we've all got experience with this.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear this soft growling sound as you watch these tiny humanoid creatures with long thin arms and legs, hairless gray skin, begin to pull their way out of small holes and tunnels in the sides of this mound. You watch as ghouls began to emerge now from the recent disturbing of their space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hate ghouls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But the Forcs can take them. Forcs! It's dinner time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you rolled so high on the intelligence check, you do know that they have a hard time with bright light. However, I would like you all to roll initiative because they are immediately lunging towards you. (snarls)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember, they have a hard time with bright light!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You had a torch, right, in your hand?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: We're using darkvision. Some of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Totally black.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yep. Let's go back in time. Did anyone--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did mention torches, but I didn't say I pulled it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, initiative order. What do you have?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Skak, you're up first. As you kept the helmet in your hand, you're like (hesitating).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far away are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two of them that are ten feet from you now, rushing in your direction, and a few that are about 25 or 30 feet on the other side of the mound that are now climbing over it and darting towards you. You move first, though, so there's nobody quite in range or no one who's attacking you yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to take out one of my acid vials, and I'm going to throw it from atop your shoulders at the two ghouls coming forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. Okay, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Using Acid Splash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the acid burn up. No effect, unfortunately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my bonus action to nimble escape, and I want to jump off your shoulders and hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, yeah. So we'll say you dart off, and go ahead and roll a stealth check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Good to know. So that's you. You're hidden. That ends Skak's turn. Eden, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So there's two close together and two others?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's four now rushing right in the front, and they're somewhat close. You can get in between two of them and hit both.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we all have darkvision?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe you do, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And my flurry of blows, can that be used on multiple targets? All right, so I'll run up to the first and quarterstaff attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, yeah. 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits, yeah. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You smack it, and you dislocate its shoulder. And it gives a horrible pained sound as it does so. It's hurt pretty bad. These things are not very hardy, there's just a lot of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I will flurry of blows and strike him with my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 does not hit, unfortunately. You're too confident at this point. As you swing a second time, it ducks below, missing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll strike again with my hand. (yelps) Oh, that one's better. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, you slam down and crumple its head into its shoulder. It makes this gurgle sound as it falls to the ground. And there's one who's now rushing up behind you that you can move into and get your final attack, if you want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With my hand, right? My bonus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hand, or your staff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Well, then I will quarterstaff him in the gut!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it. So you run up and use that momentum.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah! 18 plus seven. Ooh! 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Yeah, roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One. So five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five points of damage. All right, so it hits him, and he gives this guttural loss of air sound, but it's still standing without an issue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that a part of the flurry of blows attack, or is that when I bonus attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the flurry of blows becomes your bonus. You do two attacks instead of one with your bonus is what flurry does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. So if I hit someone with a flurry of blows, he must succeed on a dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh shit. With an eight, no, he does not. So the one you slam, while it doesn't kill him, it knocks him off his feet, and it falls to the ground. It's clawing to find purchase to get itself back to its feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, Forcs. Appetizer course is over. I don't know how far I can take this metaphor! (laughter)

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: All the way till dessert, is what I think!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Salad course!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something's going to strike at you-- okay, that's a 23 to hit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17! It jumps onto your back but it can't pierce your hard hide, while another one-- a third one is going to rush up behind you as well. That one is going to be a 21 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them is going to rush towards you, Mozuu, and one's going to rush around trying to look--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sings)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that would've been amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No more eagles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because they don't know where you are and they're a little scared of you at the moment. All right, that's going to be a 21?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: 21 points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, 21 to hit. What's your armor class?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yeah, it hits. Because I'm an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you take two points of slashing damage from the scratch, and 18?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take three points of piercing damage from the bite. The other one that swung up to you, because this one is now currently flanking you with the other one, that is a 23 to hit, which I believe hits. And then 24 to hit. 18 and 19.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mozuu! They have chosen you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! (laughs)

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: It's part of my name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's seven points of slashing damage plus an additional 1d4. So you get an additional one, so it's eight points of slashing damage. And second strike is going to be-- damage-wise, (counting) ooh, nine points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ding!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are you at? What's your health at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're ganging up on you. You get the sense, individually they are not very dangerous, necessarily. They go down pretty quick. But when they gang up, it's bad, and they're ganging up on Mozuu right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've heard this before about ghouls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So ending that turn. Arby, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to-- you said they're susceptible to bright light?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bright light!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I'm going to pull out my torch and I'm going to hold it in the same hand with my maul, because I got big hands. And then I'm going to swing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to say it takes an action for you to light the torch--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As a bonus action, I took it out but I didn't light it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're just holding it? Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hoping that'll be enough light?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. And then I'm going to try to hit the ones that were attacking Mozuu.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for the first attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It must cast some light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Twenty-- I suck at this particular number combination. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits. Yeah, go and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a 20 and a one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Apparently it's forever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that's good. That's 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With one strike, you splatter this ghoul across the mound. You see its arms and legs go flying apart as its torso is crushed and destroyed. It's in pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to attack another one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the torso light the torch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. (laughs) It's important to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 just hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Oh, I get to reroll that. Yes! 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of damage. You splatter a second one. You come swinging, and with each hit, the one to the left and the one to the right of Mozuu are both turned to absolute unliving matter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So there's two more of them on Mozuu? There's two more on Mozuu?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's three that are now climbing up on Eden that have been trying to strike through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to turn. I'm going to use my action surge to hit two more to try to hit them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you use the last bit of your movement. This will be the end of your movement to get to Eden, but you can attack two that are on him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: eight plus five is 12-- 13? No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight plus five is 13. That's correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You actually slam the maul into the side of Eden. Eden, you take just a simple three points of bludgeoning damage, but the ghoul that was currently clasped onto your side is smeared against you. There is a spray of dark crimson.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got one more attack here. Ooh, that's good. That definitely hits. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! 15!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. And with that, you splattered the one on the other side, the back shoulder portion of Eden, and this time, you don't slam it

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what that means.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While this is happening, Mozuu, it's your turn.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: There are two in the distance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two more. There's one that got up on the ground that's in front of Eden, there's one that's rushing in, and there's one that's on top of Eden's shoulders right now.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I'll go for the one that's on top of Eden's shoulders. I want to pull him off and bite, and try and rip his throat out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. Said so casually! "I would like to bite and--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you rush up to the side to grab it, make a grapple check. Roll an athletics check.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Okay. Oh! 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ghoul rolled a natural one. Without an issue, you peel the ghoul off its back. Do you want to lunge for its throat? All right, roll an attack.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: 12 plus my strength?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus your strength, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. Okay. Roll a 1d4 and add your strength modifier and damage to it.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That would be 16, my modifier? Three! So six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of damage. So as you pull the ghoul off, it's screeching. You grab it by the back of the head, pull it back, sink your teeth into its throat and tear a chunk out. It's not a mortal wound, but now it's missing part of its throat, and its screeching goes from a (screech) to (moan) this horrible sucking sound as part of its trachea is now exposed.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I get another attack. It says, "you can make two attacks."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, right.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: When you make an attack action, you can make two attacks. I want to attack his throat again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. He has a bonus action. War cleric.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That's a 15. That is an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll another d4.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That's another six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull away the first piece of flesh, you spit it to the side. As this horrible sucking screech sound happens, you reach down this time, getting a larger bite into its throat, and as you pull back, you leave nothing but the spine left behind, and the ghoul goes limp in your grasp, as you have the rest of its throat in your maw.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn, Mozuu? That brings it to the top. Skak, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I jump out from behind where I'm hiding, and I load my crossbow at the one that's running, and I pull the trigger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. You have advantage because it does not see you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21? All right, roll for damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 12, right? No sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were hidden.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Oh, it is sneak attack? (counting) 21.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy moly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it's rushing, we're talking 28 Days Later sprinting zombie level. Falls limp, unmoving, onto the mound. The bolt went through its throat and chest area.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Forcs!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eden, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should go? Seems like they keep coming. Maybe we should run?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, I remember they have a weakness to bright light, and they live in hives. We should go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry, I have a torch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't light it! I think it's an unlit torch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you said it was susceptible--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't hurt yourself. It's okay. We should go! Mozuu?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mozuu, do we have your blessing to flee?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Look, a lot happened just now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's on your face?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: You're leader.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm leader. You hear that? Bow before me!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I bow before him. You gave me eyes, and yet I didn't see. I didn't see this hive, and I almost died. I'm not leader. I'm not fit to lead the Forcs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: You're leader, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: You're leader, too. I follow all three of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can't have two leaders.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: There's two things I know: the Forcs have three leaders and one follower. There's three things I know: that follower is me, and that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eden, while this is happening, it's your turn, and you've been bowing to him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's been bowing to me. I'm going to run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You still have one on your shoulders, by the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: A lovely speech.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it's trying to claw and bite you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Delineating responsibility.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to run and hope he falls off, like a big bucking bronco. I'll use my step of the wind to go faster and jump really far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? And a seven.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second one up behind you. That is 18? All right, with that, because they're ganged up on you, they do more damage. That is six points of slashing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we leaving?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: You're leaving.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought that was the plan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's their turn now, and then they get to go.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Bye!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 21.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: A leader leaves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to you, Arby. What are you going to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'm going to try to kill these things that were attacking me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You've got three of them on you right now. They're climbing all over you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! I thought that was really good, but it wasn't. It's 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 still hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (cackles) 16!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. There's one to the side. You grab it by the head and smash it in your grip and throw it to the ground with a slopping sound. Your next attack?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to look down and try to hit the one that's at my feet. That's a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You try to reach for him, but he's just out of reach, so you start spinning to try to get a better reach, but he's attached to you, so he spins, too. You end up going in circles for the rest of your round, chasing your tail.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eden! I thought I was supposed to run, but I can't run!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's ghouls!

lines.name: MATT
