lines.text: Mozuu, you're up.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: It worked once. I'm going to grab him and try to rip his throat out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Now you have a taste of ghoul in your mouth. You rush over to Arburuk. Make a grapple check.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Grapple is plus what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an athletics check.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Oh, great. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20? All right. Rolled a 19, actually. 18 plus one for its strength. It's not enough, so you manage to grab and pull it and barely peel it off, and you're going to try to go for its throat again? Roll an attack.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: 18 plus three. That is a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage. 1d4 plus your strength.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Three plus three. That is a six. We are repeating again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll one more time.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Seven. So that's ten, so that did not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Mozuu? Skak, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many are left? Two? Three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are three. There's one that's still stuck to Arby, there's one that's being held by Mozuu, and there's one that fell off the shoulders of Eden as he ran away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are any of them within 15 feet of me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you were, you're not that far from Arby and Mozuu. You could probably move in pretty close, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to try and cast Thunderwave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thunderwave? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's going to hit you guys, isn't it? It hits everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can aim it in a way that will hit both of them, but you'll hit hit either one or the other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could hit all of them, all four. You won't hit Eden, because he's too far away, but you can hit all four of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) Guys, are you coming or what? Guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: May the dark lord grant me a Thunderwave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you do is reach into your pouch and find one of those explosives that you had earlier, and you throw it and clench backward. I need both Mozuu and Arby to roll a constitution saving throw. I'm going to do the same. What's your spell save DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both fail. You rolled a ten? Fail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll 2d8.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You asshole. I mean, you glob!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys take 13 points of thunder damage and are blown ten feet back as this small rolling ball explodes in a concussive blast. Both of the ghouls get scattered into nothing. The sound of the explosion echoes throughout the mountains, and both of you guys get pushed back ten feet, almost landing on the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I bonus action my nimble escape? To hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 15. No, 23. Stealth is plus ten! I'm used to the other. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as the explosion happens and you're standing right where the ball rolled, you're like, "shit!" Move back behind the mound and try to stealth and hide. Okay, that ends your turn. Both of them are detonated, at this point. There is the one across the way that fell off that's trying to catch up to Eden but is too slow. There's none currently out in the open, but you can hear sounds of scratching and little voices.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't really hear anything after that explosion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. The two of you, your bell's a little rung. You hear this, as you're hiding up against the mound right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many of those explosive orbs did I use? All of them, or just two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say, for as many spell slots as you have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that brings us to Eden.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm 80 feet away, and my darkvision can't see that far, so all I heard was an explosion in the dark, so I drop to my knee, and I say: As the only surviving member of the Forcs, I will say a word to thank the great dark lord for choosing me to carry on the mantle of this mission. And I will keep running as fast as I can away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You bolt away. This poor little ghoul has no sight of you. As that ends your turn, it is now the ghoul's turn. It's like, (panting). It's lost and doesn't see you. It's going to make a perception check. Nope! It begins scrambling its way back toward the mound.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it know where home is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out. The rest of this story is the saddest little ghoul.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like Benji.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three more ghouls emerge from the inside of the mound.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Thank you! Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Some of them are apparently explosive.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Explosive!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Arby, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should run away! And I start running away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As I'm running, do I see the little lost ghoul?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say yes. I'll say as you're running away, it's coming back towards you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I splat it. I want to try to splat it as I'm running.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I totally heard law school.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I passed the bar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so this one ghoul who had made his journey back finally sees home and is running up and sees you (heavy footsteps, impact) and full-on whack-a-mole him into the dirt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I keep running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You keep running.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use-- as my bonus action, I'm going to use my second wind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Mozuu.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I'm now at nine. I can perform Lay on Hands and heal myself. Does that take time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an action.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yeah. If it's my turn, I'm going to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You can use as many points as you want to heal yourself.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: So if I spend nine hit points to heal as many as I can?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a pool of 25 hit points total, and you choose a number of that 25. You only have 25 for the whole day that you can heal with that, but you can do five or ten or eight.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I'd like to try for ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you use your action to heal ten hit points. Mark those ten off, and you heal ten.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Great. I'm at 19, minus ten, and then I will run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You go running and bolting off. Okay, so as you guys are all charging, you're still hidden against the mound. You see these three emerge from the side, and they're between you and your allies as you're pressed against the mound.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (screams) I take off running, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to hit. That's a 17 plus five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uncanny dodge!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that's five points of slashing damage, which you take half of, so that's two. But you go running past? Double charge? Okay. As you guys are running, they're pretty quick, and they're keeping pace with you. They can't quite catch up to you, but they're following. As you're rushing, since you're the furthest behind, make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. After a while, you eventually hear the sound subside, and it seems like they're returning to their mound. They don't want to get too far away from their home base.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They don't want to get lost like some other little ghouls out there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (wheezes) I think they left us behind. Why do I sound like this?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: They get you in the throat, did they?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. We're clear!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Sorry. Thought you were an imposter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Forgot my inhaler.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the three of you reconvene, you make your way up the path and see one heavy breathing, exhausted Eden, alone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They took care of me.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: They're standing behind you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! I'm hearing voices again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the dark lord.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yeah, the dark lord is speaking to you now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should probably pick your nose.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two voices. Oh god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ur-Eden!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, well. I'll end it all right here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: No, it's us! Turn around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, hi!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Olog-hai, right back at you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're faster than I thought.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi. How'd it go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We killed them. All of them. Every last one of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She killed five of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did. Is that how many I killed?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry I left, but when he made me leaver--

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Leader.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Leader? Oh. I thought he said "leaver."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Made me leaver?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, shall we continue eastward?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which way is that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I know which way is east?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check, since you guys are a little scattered, at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nature check. Natural 20. That doesn't help with directions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do that for a moment and realize that doesn't help. However, you glance over and see the orange glow of the top of Mount Doom, and that does help you realize: Ah! That is east.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is east.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin to move in that direction, I'll let you-- since you're leading this charge again, with the helmet, make a perception check with advantage because of the nature check. That 20 gave you a benefit to this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perception with advantage, or nature with advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception with advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That helps. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. You guys have now crested the highest point of this mountain range and are now making your way down the opposite side of this first ridge. As you climb over the edge, you glance over. Are you still on the shoulders of your olog-hai friend?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I climb back up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over the shoulders and look down just past the shelf, and you see this very faint bit of light, tucked in this small outcove in the side of the mountain. You glance past, and you can see six uruk figures, five of which are bundled up in ramshackle rags, small sleeping bag bundles, and one of them has a torch across its shoulder, keeping watch. They look roughly about the size of the goblins that you saw fleeing from the scene.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shushing) I see figures ahead. Three of them. Three of them! One on guard with a torch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think we could take them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, slit their throats while they're resting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will you help me? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm pretty hurt, too. And you're hurt, as well. Should we take another rest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we? Can we rest and watch them while we rest? Let's sit down for 30 minutes, around, and maybe heal a little bit, but then be ready to attack if they get up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we charge in!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Skak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can heal us if you want, and we can keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, gather around. I will need to use all of my healing potential for this. What hurts?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, my elbow's been giving me some problems lately, because I think the maul might be a little too-- I may be overextending.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I think we're hurt from the fighting that we just did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Well, a ghoul bit me on my knee, and a ghoul bit my ankle, and another one got up here around the shoulder, but I can't tell if it's from the scar that Skak gave me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cake some mud onto all of her wounds and heal her 13 points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good! I was down 15.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, where do you hurt? What ails you?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Specifically, everything. I will take whatever you give, O glorious leader. I bow to your healing prowess.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will take my hair--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have hair?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I have a little bit. I shake off the dandruff, make it into a tea that he drinks, but it's filled with protein.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uruk scalp protein?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. That heals 11 points.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I may be chosen, but you? You're good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dandruff scalp protein?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I keep a little flask of grog. I'll swig that. Can I heal myself a bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah. 11 points. Back up in it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we run to the restroom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was actually about to say, as you guys are taking this moment to heal yourselves up and prepare yourselves for whatever point of entry to this apparently unaware group of sleeping uruk traitors are, we're going to take a break. We'll rest up here for a minute. We'll be back here for the second half, very soon, of our journey deeper into the dark depths of Mordor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Forcs!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: The Forcs!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you again WB Games for this. We'll come back here with the second half real soon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so much fun!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are awesome! [music]
